T02TD3088E:186b-0: @186b * // dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang pha rol gyi dmag bzlog pa ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te /
T02TD3088E:186b-1: phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas par bsgoms nas /
T02TD3088E:186b-2: mdun du 'chi bdag gnas par bsgom te /
T02TD3088E:186b-3: phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de la bsnun pa'i sbyor ba bya ste /
T02TD3088E:186b-4: tshur 'dus bas bdag ye shes kyi bdud rtsis lus la phan gdags par bsams te /
T02TD3088E:186b-5: thams cad 'joms pa bzlas par bya'o//
T02TD3088E:186b-6: ngag bzlog pa ni grog mkhar gyi sa dang /
T02TD3088E:186b-7: ba lang gi gci ba la bsgrub bya'i ming gzugs byas la /
T02TD3088E:186b-8: de'i snying gar sngar gyi 'khrul 'khor bris pa'i mthar /
T02TD3088E:186b-9: che ge mo m'a ra ya bandha ya nan bya ba bcug ste bkod nas bcug nas /
T02TD3088E:186b-10: gzugs kyi khar thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar dang phur bus btab ste /
T02TD3088E:186b-11: de nas mchod rten rnying pa'am /
T02TD3088E:186b-13: lam rgya gram du bzlog bsgrub bya'i yul gyi phyogs su tsha tsha'i 'og tu'am /
T02TD3088E:186b-14: yang na rang gi mal 'og tu dong gru gsum pa byas pa'am /
T02TD3088E:186b-15: 'og tu bzhag nas bye mas bkang ste /
T02TD3088E:186b-16: g-yam pa la rdo rje rgya gram bris la mnan pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T02TD3088E:186b-17: de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang legs ldan drag po la gtor ma byin la /
T02TD3088E:186b-19: che ge mo'i ngag bcings shing che ge mo'i srung ma bdag gi dbang du gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD3088E:186b-20: rang srung ba yang thun mong du lha'i nga rgyal gyis bzlas sgom rtag tu bya ba dang /
T02TD3088E:186b-21: lus la sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gdags so //
